00322 #ifndef CONFIG_IQ_MATRIX_ROM
00323 /**
00324  * @brief Initializing of iq parameter for the receiver.
00325  * @param bandwidth this parameter determines the the mode (fdma or 80 MHz)
00326  * @param symbolDur this parameter determines the symbol duration between 500ns and 8us)
00327  *
00328  * This function initializes the iq parameter for the receiver depending
00329  * on the bandwidth and symbol duration.
00330  *
00331  */
00332 /**************************************************************************/
00333 void NTRXSetRxIqMatrix (uint8_t bandwidth, uint8_t symbolDur)
00334 /**************************************************************************/
00335 {
00336     uint8_t *tmpBuffer = upMsg.data;
00337     uint8_t *ptr = NULL;
00338     uint16_t len;
00339     if (bandwidth == NA_22MHz)
00340     {
00341         switch (symbolDur)
00342         {
00343 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_1000NS
00344             case NA_1us:   ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Rx_22MHz_1000ns; break;
00345 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_1000NS */
00346 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_2000NS
00347              case NA_2us:   ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Rx_22MHz_2000ns; break;
00348 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_2000NS */
00349 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_4000NS
00350             case NA_4us:   ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Rx_22MHz_4000ns; break;
00351 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_4000NS */
00352             default: return;
00353         }
00354     }
00355     if (bandwidth == NA_80MHz)
00356     {
00357         switch (symbolDur)
00358         {
00359 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_500NS
00360             case NA_500ns: ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Rx_80MHz_500ns; break;
00361 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_500NS */
00362 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_1000NS
00363             case NA_1us:   ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Rx_80MHz_1000ns; break;
00364 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_1000NS */
00365 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_2000NS
00366             case NA_2us:   ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Rx_80MHz_2000ns; break;
00367 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_2000NS */
00368 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_4000NS
00369             case NA_4us:   ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Rx_80MHz_4000ns; break;
00370 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_4000NS */
00371             default: return;
00372         }
00373     }
00374 
00375     len = ReadRomByte (ptr[0]);
00376     /* Device select 3 */
00377     memcpy_P (tmpBuffer, &(ptr[1]), len);
00378     NTRXSetIndexReg (0x30);
00379     NTRXSPIWrite ((NA_RamD3lPatI_O & 0xff),     tmpBuffer, len);
00380 
00381     memcpy_P (tmpBuffer, &(ptr[1+ len]), len);
00382     NTRXSetIndexReg (0x31);
00383     NTRXSPIWrite ((NA_RamD3lPatQ_O & 0xff),     tmpBuffer, len);
00384 }
00385 
00386 
00387 /**
00388  * @brief Initializing of iq parameter for the transmitter.
00389  * @param bandwidth this parameter determines the the mode (fdma or 80 MHz)
00390  * @param symbolDur this parameter determines the symbol duration between 500ns and 8us)
00391  *
00392  * This function initializes the iq parameter for the transmitter depending
00393  * on the bandwidth and symbol duration.
00394  *
00395  */
00396 /*sr*************************************************************************/
00397 void NTRXSetTxIqMatrix (uint8_t bandwidth, uint8_t symbolDur)
00398 /*sr*************************************************************************/
00399 {
00400     uint8_t *tmpBuffer = upMsg.data;
00401     uint16_t len;
00402     uint16_t offset;
00403     uint8_t *ptr = NULL;
00404 
00405     if (bandwidth == NA_22MHz)
00406     {
00407         switch (symbolDur)
00408         {
00409 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_1000NS
00410             case NA_1us:   ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Tx_22MHz_1000ns; break;
00411 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_1000NS */
00412 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_2000NS
00413             case NA_2us:   ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Tx_22MHz_2000ns; break;
00414 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_2000NS */
00415 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_4000NS
00416             case NA_4us:   ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Tx_22MHz_4000ns; break;
00417 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_4000NS */
00418             default: return;
00419         }
00420     }
00421     if (bandwidth == NA_80MHz)
00422     {
00423         switch (symbolDur)
00424         {
00425 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_500NS
00426             case NA_500ns: ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Tx_80MHz_500ns; break;
00427 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_500NS */
00428 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_1000NS
00429             case NA_1us:   ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Tx_80MHz_1000ns; break;
00430 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_1000NS */
00431 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_2000NS
00432             case NA_2us:   ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Tx_80MHz_2000ns; break;
00433 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_2000NS */
00434 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_4000NS
00435             case NA_4us:   ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_Tx_80MHz_4000ns; break;
00436 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_4000NS */
00437             default: return;
00438         }
00439     }
00440 
00441     len = ReadRomByte (ptr[0]);
00442 
00443     NTRXSetIndexReg (0x20);
00444 
00445     NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_CsqMemAddrInit_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_CsqMemAddrInit_O] | (1 << NA_CsqMemAddrInit_B));
00446     offset = 0;
00447     if (len > 128)
00448     {
00449         len -= 128;
00450         memcpy_P (tmpBuffer, &(ptr[1]), 128);
00451         NTRXSPIWrite (0x80, tmpBuffer, 128);
00452         offset = 128;
00453     }
00454     memcpy_P (tmpBuffer, &(ptr[1 + offset]), len);
00455     NTRXSPIWrite (0x80, tmpBuffer, len);
00456 
00457     NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_CsqMemAddrInit_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_CsqMemAddrInit_O] | (1 << NA_CsqMemAddrInit_B));
00458     NTRXSetIndexReg (0x21);
00459     offset = 0;
00460     len = ReadRomByte (ptr[0]);
00461     if (len > 128)
00462     {
00463         len -= 128;
00464         memcpy_P (tmpBuffer, &(ptr[1 + ReadRomByte (ptr[0])]), 128);
00465         NTRXSPIWrite (0x80, tmpBuffer, 128);
00466         offset = 128;
00467     }
00468     memcpy_P (tmpBuffer, &(ptr[1 + ReadRomByte (ptr[0]) + offset]), len);
00469     NTRXSPIWrite (0x80, tmpBuffer, len);
00470 
00471     NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_CsqMemAddrInit_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_CsqMemAddrInit_O] | (1 << NA_CsqMemAddrInit_B));
00472     NTRXSetIndexReg (0x22);
00473 
00474     len = ReadRomByte (ptr[0]);
00475     offset = 0;
00476     if (len > 128)
00477     {
00478          len -= 128;
00479         memcpy_P (tmpBuffer, &(ptr[1 + (2 * ReadRomByte (ptr[0]))]), 128);
00480         NTRXSPIWrite (0x80, tmpBuffer, 128);
00481         offset = 128;
00482     }
00483     memcpy_P (tmpBuffer, &(ptr[1 + (2 * ReadRomByte (ptr[0])) + offset]), len);
00484     NTRXSPIWrite (0x80, tmpBuffer, len);
00485 
00486     NTRXSetIndexReg (0x00);
00487 }
00488 #endif
00489 
00490 /**
00491  * @brief Initializing the AGC values
00492  * @param bandwidth this parameter determines the the mode (fdma or 80 MHz)
00493  * @param symbolDur this parameter determines the symbol duration between 500ns and 8us)
00494  * @param symbolRate this parameter determines the symbol rate between 125kbit and 2Mbit)
00495  *
00496  * This function initializes the agc values for a specific mode.
00497  *
00498  */
00499 /*sr*************************************************************************/
00500 void NTRXSetAgcValues (uint8_t bandwidth, uint8_t symbolDur, uint8_t symbolRate)
00501 /*sr*************************************************************************/
00502 {
00503     if (bandwidth == NA_80MHz)
00504     {
00505         ntrxShadowReg[NA_FdmaEnable_O] &= ~(1 << NA_FdmaEnable_B);
00506         NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_FdmaEnable_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_FdmaEnable_O]);
00507 
00508         ntrxShadowReg[NA_PulseDetDelay_O] &= ~(0x3f << NA_PulseDetDelay_LSB);
00509         ntrxShadowReg[NA_PulseDetDelay_O] |= (4 << NA_PulseDetDelay_LSB);
00510         NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_PulseDetDelay_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_PulseDetDelay_O]);
00511     }
00512     ntrxShadowReg[NA_AgcHold_O] |= (1 << NA_AgcHold_B);
00513 
00514     ntrxShadowReg[NA_AgcDefaultEn_O] |= (1 << NA_AgcDefaultEn_B);
00515 
00516     ntrxShadowReg[NA_AgcValue_O] &= ~(0x3f << NA_AgcValue_LSB);
00517     if (bandwidth == NA_80MHz)
00518     {
00519         ntrxShadowReg[NA_AgcValue_O] |= (30 << NA_AgcValue_LSB); // was 35
00520     }
00521     if (bandwidth == NA_22MHz)
00522     {
00523         ntrxShadowReg[NA_AgcValue_O] |= (35 << NA_AgcValue_LSB);
00524     }
00525     NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_AgcValue_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_AgcValue_O]);
00526     if (bandwidth == NA_22MHz)
00527     {
00528 #       ifndef CONFIG_IQ_MATRIX_ROM
00529         ntrxShadowReg[NA_FdmaEnable_O] |= (1 << NA_FdmaEnable_B);
00530         NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_FdmaEnable_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_FdmaEnable_O]);
00531 #       endif /* CONFIG_IQ_MATRIX_ROM */
00532         ntrxShadowReg[NA_PulseDetDelay_O] &= ~(0x1f << NA_PulseDetDelay_LSB);
00533         ntrxShadowReg[NA_PulseDetDelay_O] |= (2 << NA_PulseDetDelay_LSB);
00534         NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_PulseDetDelay_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_PulseDetDelay_O]);
00535     }
00536 
00537     ntrxShadowReg[NA_LnaFreqAdjust_O] &= ~(0x03 << NA_LnaFreqAdjust_LSB);
00538     NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_LnaFreqAdjust_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_LnaFreqAdjust_O]);
00539 
00540     ntrxShadowReg[NA_GateSizeFramesync_O] &= ~(0x03 << NA_GateSizeFramesync_LSB);
00541     ntrxShadowReg[NA_GateSizeFramesync_O] |= (NA_GateSize5Slots_VC_C << NA_GateSizeFramesync_LSB);
00542     NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_GateSizeFramesync_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_GateSizeFramesync_O]);
00543 
00544     ntrxShadowReg[NA_SymbolDur_O] &= ~((0x07 << NA_SymbolDur_LSB) | (0x07 << NA_SymbolRate_LSB));
00545     ntrxShadowReg[NA_SymbolDur_O] |= ((symbolDur << NA_SymbolDur_LSB) | (symbolRate << NA_SymbolRate_LSB));
00546     NTRXSPIWriteByte (NA_SymbolDur_O, ntrxShadowReg[NA_SymbolDur_O]);
00547 
00548 }
00549 
00550 /**
00551  * @brief Initializing of correlator threshold values for a specific mode.
00552  * @param bandwidth this parameter determines the the mode (fdma or 80 MHz)
00553  * @param symbolDur this parameter determines the symbol duration between 500ns and 8us)
00554  *
00555  * This function initializes the correlator threshold registers for a
00556  * specific mode.
00557  *
00558  */
00559 /**************************************************************************/
00560 void NTRXSetCorrThreshold (uint8_t bandwidth, uint8_t symbolDur)
00561 /**************************************************************************/
00562 {
00563     uint8_t threshold[5];
00564     uint8_t *ptr = NULL;
00565 
00566     NTRXSetIndexReg (0x32);
00567     if (bandwidth == NA_80MHz)
00568     {
00569         switch (symbolDur)
00570         {
00571 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_500NS
00572             case NA_500ns:  ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_THRES_80MHz_500ns; break;
00573 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_500NS */
00574 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_1000NS
00575             case NA_1us:    ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_THRES_80MHz_1000ns; break;
00576 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_1000NS */
00577 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_2000NS
00578             case NA_2us:    ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_THRES_80MHz_2000ns; break;
00579 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_2000NS */
00580 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_4000NS
00581             case NA_4us:    ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_THRES_80MHz_4000ns; break;
00582 #           endif /* NTRX_80MHZ_4000NS */
00583             default:        return;
00584         }
00585     }
00586 
00587     if (bandwidth == NA_22MHz)
00588     {
00589         switch (symbolDur)
00590         {
00591 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_1000NS
00592             case NA_1us:    ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_THRES_22MHz_1000ns; break;
00593 #           endif /* NTRX_22MHZ_1000NS */
00594 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_2000NS
00595             case NA_2us:    ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_THRES_22MHz_2000ns; break;
00596 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_2000NS */
00597 #           ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_4000NS
00598             case NA_4us:    ptr = (uint8_t *)NA5TR1_THRES_22MHz_4000ns; break;
00599 #           endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_4000NS */
00600             default:        return;
00601         }
00602     }
00603 
00604     memcpy_P (threshold, ptr, 5);
00605     NTRXSPIWrite (0x80, threshold, 5);
00606 }
